10DIM values% 256
20DIM prog% 100
30FOR O%=0 TO 3 STEP 3
40P%=prog%
50[OPT O%
54LDA #1
55.bitloop
60DEY
70BMI gotbit
80ASL A
90BCC bitloop
100.gotbit
110AND values%, X
120STA &70
130RTS
140]
150NEXT
1010I%=0
1020REPEAT
1030READ value%
1040values%?I%=value%
1050I%=I%+1
1060UNTIL value%=-1
1065start=TIME
1070FOR I%=1 TO 2020
1080IF FNhas_number(I%) AND FNhas_number(2020-I%) THEN PRO.found(I%)
1090NEXT
1095PRINT TIME-start
1100END
1110DEF PRO.found(number%)
1120other%=2020-number%
1130PRINT "Found ";number%;" and ";other%;" result = ";number%*other%
1140ENDPROC
1150DEF FNhas_number(number%)
1160X%=number% DIV 8
1170Y%=number% AND 7
1180CALL prog%
1190=?&70 <> 0
1199DATA0
1200DATA0
1210DATA0
